pickipediainvitations-desc: Gates account creation behind invite codes with entity attestations
pickipediainvitations-must-be-logged-in: You must be logged in to create invites.
pickipediainvitations-createinvite-intro: Use this form to create an invite code for a new user. Anyone with the code can use it to create an account.
pickipediainvitations-field-entitytype-h: Is this account for a human or a bot? This creates an attestation on their user page.
pickipediainvitations-field-expiredays-h: Set to 0 for no expiration. Default is 30 days.
pickipediainvitations-error-badtoken: Invalid security token. Please try again.
pickipediainvitations-success-message: Your invite code has been created.
pickipediainvitations-success-share-inst: Send this link to the person you want to invite. They can use it to create an account with any username they choose.
pickipediainvitations-myinvites-none: You haven't created any invites yet.
pickipediainvitations-manageinvites-intr: This page shows all invites in the system. You can view invitation chains and revoke unused invites.
pickipediainvitations-manageinvites-none: No invites have been created yet.
pickipediainvitations-revoke-failed: Failed to revoke invite. It may have already been used.
pickipediainvitations-error-notowner: You can only revoke your own invites.
pickipediainvitations-chain-genesis: $1 is a genesis user (created before the invitation system or bootstrapped).
pickipediainvitations-chain-intro: The following shows who invited $1 and the chain of invitations leading back to genesis users:
pickipediainvitations-chain-explanation: The first person in the list is the user, followed by who invited them, then who invited that person, and so on.
pickipediainvitations-code-required: An invite code is required to create an account.
pickipediainvitations-field-invitecode-h: Enter the invite code you received from an existing user.
pickipediainvitations-attestation-must-b: You must be logged in to create attestations.
pickipediainvitations-attestation-intro: Use this form to create an attestation vouching for another user. Your attestation will appear on their user page and creates a web-of-trust record.
pickipediainvitations-attestation-field-: Enter the username of the person you want to vouch for.
How do you know this person?
Choose the highest level that applies.
pickipediainvitations-attestation-type-r: We have played on a record or together at a show
pickipediainvitations-attestation-type-c: We have worked together on some other project(s)
pickipediainvitations-attestation-type-s: I've seen them play / they've seen me play
pickipediainvitations-attestation-type-m: I've met them in person and confirmed they're human
pickipediainvitations-attestation-field-: Write about how you know this person, what you can vouch for, etc. You can use wikitext including links and images.
Write a freeform attestation. You can include wikitext formatting, links, and images.
pickipediainvitations-attestation-error-: User not found. They must have an account to be attested.
You cannot create an attestation for yourself.
You have already created an attestation for this user. Edit the existing page instead.
pickipediainvitations-attestation-edit-d: You can only edit your own attestations. This attestation belongs to another user.
